name: Tailwind CSS Figma Design System by Flowbite
description:
Figma design system built for integration with Tailwind CSS by Flowbite

Flowbite is a free and open-source set of Figma UI components and pages designed to integrate with the utility classes from Tailwind CSS.


💎 Unlock the full version

Get access to the full version of Flowbite which includes 27 hand-crafted pages, responsive screen examples for mobile, tablet, and desktop devices, advanced UI elements using Figma variants, auto-layouts, style guideline, and many more.


📦 1000+ UI components and variants

The full version includes thousands of advanced UI components such as buttons, autocomplete inputs, datepickers, dropdowns, navigation bars and many more.

These components have variants that you can use to change the color, size, and responsive layout just from a click away.


🎥 Check out this video presentation of Flowbite to learn more about the efficiency of the component variants.


🌙 Dark mode included

All of the components and pages have a dark version included as a variant so you can deliver both light and dark versions for the UI of your website and application.


📱 Responsive pages

All of the pages have a mobile, tablet, and desktop view available as variants so you can deliver fully responsive and modern user interfaces.


🎨 Advanced styleguide based on Tailwind CSS

The heart of this Figma design system is the styleguide which is based on the utility classes from Tailwind CSS.

We developed advanced variants for the typography, shadows, colors, and many more.


📐 Layout grid

You can also use the grid system available in the full version of Flowbite to make it easier to arrange the elements inside the Figma file.


💰 Unlock full version

👉 You can purchase the full version of this Figma design system by checking out flowbite.com.


💻 Code version

There's also a coded version available and you can check out the following links to get started:


  • Flowbite Library - Tailwind CSS components
  • Flowbite Pro - Premium Tailwind CSS components and pages
